sentence.Network_en: The thing he bought yesterday was trumpery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他昨天买的只是一件没有什么价值的东西。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting trickery): from Old French tromperie, from tromper 'deceive'

means.word_mean: 2. ornamental objects of no great value
